task.Description: In This task participants made one of two judgments (manmade, shoebx) about words under two conditions: informed, uninformed. Colored circl cues or the color of the word indicated which judgment to make (red:shoebox, blue:manmade)

stim_set.Description: Stimulus set used for the experiment.

manmade.Description: Manmade judgment correct response: Y or N

shoebox.Description: Shoebox judgment correct response: Y or N

old_new.Description: Word is old or new for subsequent recognition task

study_judgment.Description: Judgment trial type: shoebox or manmade

study_resp_key.Description: Participants judgment response: j, k, d , f , and na for no responses

study_resp.Description: Participants numeric judgment response: 1 (yes:j,f) or 2 (no:k,d), and -99 for no responses

study_rt.Description: Participants judgment reaction time, and -99 for no responses

correct_hand.Decsription: Did participant use correct hand for semantic judgment: 1 (yes), 0 (no)

study_nr.Description: Participant made no response for study judgment

good_trial.Description: Mark if trial is a good study trial (i.e., participant responded to judgment in time and with correct hand

test_resp.Description: Participant test confidence scale response (1[sure new] - 6 [6 sure old])

test_rt.Description: Participants test confidence scale response reaction time
